zebra4j

Class BasicAttributeType

  • java.lang.Object
    • zebra4j.AllDifferentType
      • zebra4j.BasicAttributeType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeType

    @Immutable
public class BasicAttributeType
extends AllDifferentType
    Defines an attribute type using a set of labels.

    This is the easiest way to define a custom attribute. See Attributes.PET as an example.

    This implementation does not support internationalization to remain simple. Just write the labels and patterns in the desired locale.

    See Also:
    AllDifferentType

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicAttributeType

        public BasicAttributeType(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> labels,
                          java.lang.String questionPattern,
                          java.lang.String typeName)
        Create a new basic type of attribute with enumerated set of attributes
        Parameters:
        labels - the labels of all attributes of this type, starting with a verb e.g. "is from France", "owns a dog". See also Attribute.description(java.util.Locale)
        questionPattern - See AttributeType.questionSentencePart(java.util.Locale)
        typeName - Short name of the type, used in debug output

    • Method Detail

      • questionSentencePart

        public java.lang.String questionSentencePart(java.util.Locale locale)
        Description copied from interface: AttributeType
        Returns the pattern for questions "about" this attribute type
        Returns:
        a pattern for String.format(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...) with a single placeholder for the attribute of the person the question is towards.
        See Also:
        Question

      • getAttributes

        public java.util.List<Attribute> getAttributes(int numPeople)
        Description copied from interface: AttributeType
        Return some attributes of this type.

        Used when generating solutions.

        Parameters:
        numPeople - how many attributes to return
        Returns:
        A subset of the attributes of this type
